#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int x,y;
int main()
{

    cin>>x;

    while(x--)
    {
        int m1,m2, z,s,d1,d2,c[10],d[10],i=1,nd1=0,nd2=0;
        int temp = 0,temp2=0, ans=0,ans1=0;
            cin>>z>>s;

         nd1 = floor(log10(abs(z))) + 1;
         nd2 = floor(log10(abs(s))) + 1;
        d1=nd1;
        d2=nd2;

        while(d1--)
        {
            c[i]=z%10;
            z=z/10;
            i++;
        }

        for(int k=1;k<=nd1;k++)
        {
            if(c[k]>temp)
                temp=c[k];
        }
        i=1;
        while(d2--)
        {
            d[i]=s%10;
            s=s/10;
            i++;
        }
      for( int j=1;j<=nd2;j++)
        {
            if(d[j]>temp2)
                temp2=d[j];
        }
        m1=temp+1;
        m2=temp2+1;

        for(i=1;i<=nd1;i++)
        {
            int p=(i-1);
            ans=ans+c[i]*pow(m1,p);

        }

        for(i=1;i<=nd2;i++)
        {
                       int p=(i-1);
            ans1=ans1+d[i]*pow(m2,p);

        }
        cout<<ans+ans1<<"\n";


    }
    return 0;
}
